mapper.insert: insert into photo (photo_id, photo_url, photo_title, photo_desc, photo_update_time, photo_create_time, photo_status, user_id) values (#{photoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{photoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photoDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photoUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{photoCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{photoStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update photo set photo_url = #{photoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo_title = #{photoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo_desc = #{photoDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo_update_time = #{photoUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, photo_create_time = #{photoCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, photo_status = #{photoStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where photo_id = #{photoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select photo_id, photo_url, photo_title, photo_desc, photo_update_time, photo_create_time, photo_status, user_id from photo where photo_id = #{photoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select photo_id, photo_url, photo_title, photo_desc, photo_update_time, photo_create_time, photo_status, user_id from photo
